## Checklist

Please check all that apply:

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published
- [ ] I have checked that my changes work in all supported browsers
- [ ] I have verified that the build works correctly
- [ ] I have not introduced any new dependencies
- [ ] I have updated the package.json version if needed

**PR Title Format**: `[Type] Brief description`

Example:
- `[Bug] Fix ISS position API timeout`
- `[Feature] Add VR support for solar system`
- `[Docs] Update installation instructions`

**Labels**: Please add appropriate labels:
- `bug`, `enhancement`, `documentation`, `performance`, `refactoring`, `dependencies`

**Assignees**: Please assign relevant team members

**Milestone**: Add to appropriate milestone if applicable
